headline: Monster Party Cause for Concern
context: A planned gathering of wolfmen, mummies, and $0 this weekend has raised the concern of community leaders. The "Monster Mash," in its third year, is expecting a record turnout.
"We're just a bunch of cool dudes and dudettes who just wanna party," said The Mummy, who appeared to be wrapped in $1.
Law enforcement officials did not have kind words to say. "Last year, I saw a Dracula $3. I don't want to see that again," said Sheriff Anurag Bhatia.
Humans are encouraged not to poke, prod, or tease the monsters this weekend.

drinking milk until he threw up
